Description: 1977 Gibson Les Paul Standard! Made in the USA. Heavily modded for a cool vintage player's piece. Wine Red finish on bound Maple top, capping off a single-cut Mahogany body. Set Maple neck, topped with a bound Rosewood board with vintage-style frets. Pickups have been changed to Dimarzio humbuckers(middle pickup added), a Tone Zone in the neck, a PAF Pro in the middle, and an X2N in the bridge. Pots have been replaced with push/pulls for a Jimmy Page-style set-up. Push button mounted on the pickguard takes the middle pickup in/out of the circuit. Added Bigsby trem, roller bridge, and changed Schaller tuners. No breaks or repairs. Guitar has mileage, but a ton of vibe, and sounds and plays great. Ships in its original Gibson hardshell case. Verified PayPal accepted from all buyers. Please email or call 732-713-4156 with item or payment questions before bidding. Most buyers outside the US will be welcome, but all buyers outside the continental 48 states MUST contact me BEFORE bidding. DO NOT use the eBay international postage price calculator. *Note to international buyers*- We do not forge customs forms, please do not ask. All items shipped internationally will be declared at their actual value. No exceptions. NJ residents add 7% sales tax. Thanks for looking, please check out our other auctions- Next Big Thing Guitars
Title: Vintage 1977 Gibson USA Les Paul Standard Guitar Wine Red! w/OHSC
